SELECT * FROM STORE_DETAIL sd
AND sd.store_id IN ( SELECT s.id FROM STORE s WHERE s.spoon = #{spoon} )
AND sd.store_id IN ( SELECT s.id FROM STORE s WHERE ((s.rate_count = 0 AND s.rate_total = 0) OR (s.rate_count > 0 AND s.rate_total / s.rate_count < 1)) )
AND sd.store_id IN ( SELECT s.id FROM STORE s WHERE s.rate_count > 0 AND FLOOR(s.rate_total / s.rate_count) = #{rateValue} )

SELECT * FROM MENU m
AND m.store_id IN ( SELECT s.id FROM STORE s WHERE s.spoon = #{spoon} )
AND m.store_id IN ( SELECT s.id FROM STORE s WHERE ((s.rate_count = 0 AND s.rate_total = 0) OR(s.rate_count > 0 AND s.rate_total / s.rate_count < 1)) )
AND m.store_id IN ( SELECT s.id FROM STORE s WHERE s.rate_count > 0 AND FLOOR(s.rate_total / s.rate_count) = #{rateValue} )
SELECT spoon, COUNT(*) AS count FROM STORE GROUP BY spoon ORDER BY spoon

SELECT CASE WHEN rate_total / rate_count < 1 THEN 0 WHEN rate_total / rate_count BETWEEN 1 AND 1.99 THEN 1 WHEN rate_total / rate_count BETWEEN 2 AND 2.99 THEN 2 WHEN rate_total / rate_count BETWEEN 3 AND 3.99 THEN 3 WHEN rate_total / rate_count BETWEEN 4 AND 4.99 THEN 4 ELSE 5 END AS rate, COUNT(*) AS rateCount FROM STORE GROUP BY CASE WHEN rate_total / rate_count < 1 THEN 0 WHEN rate_total / rate_count BETWEEN 1 AND 1.99 THEN 1 WHEN rate_total / rate_count BETWEEN 2 AND 2.99 THEN 2 WHEN rate_total / rate_count BETWEEN 3 AND 3.99 THEN 3 WHEN rate_total / rate_count BETWEEN 4 AND 4.99 THEN 4 ELSE 5 END ORDER BY rate
